name: Objectivity: A Millennial Love Story
description:
Objectivity: A Millennial Love Story is a game about relationships and our actions and reactions in them.

Members involved:

Created by Andrea Cao and Bartow Weiss

With Sound FX from Derek Renfroe and Music from Michael Benzinger and Matthew Boerner.

And a special thanks to Peter Brinson & Jesse Vigil for bringing us all together!
